DataElement.preferredName: Patient Cosmetic Breast Procedure Adipose Tissue Graft Performed Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes/no indicator for information related to a cosmetic breast procedure of adipose tissue (fat) graft performed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Cosmetic Breast Procedure Adipose Tissue Graft Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._A substance that is intended to be applied to the body to promote attractiveness without affecting the body's structure or functions._One of two hemispheric projections of variable size situated in the subcutaneous layer over the pectoralis major muscle on either side of the chest._Any stepwise set of actions._A specialized form of connective tissue consisting primarily of adipocytes (fat cells), surrounded by a meshwork of collagen fibers._Tissue or organ transplanted from a donor to a recipient._Executed and carried through to completion.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Cosmetic Breast Procedure Adipose Tissue Graft Performed
Property.preferredDefinition: A substance that is intended to be applied to the body to promote attractiveness without affecting the body's structure or functions.:One of two hemispheric projections of variable size situated in the subcutaneous layer over the pectoralis major muscle on either side of the chest.:Any stepwise set of actions.:A specialized form of connective tissue consisting primarily of adipocytes (fat cells), surrounded by a meshwork of collagen fibers.:Tissue or organ transplanted from a donor to a recipient.:Executed and carried through to completion.

Concepts.definition: A substance that is intended to be applied to the body to promote attractiveness without affecting the body's structure or functions.
One of two hemispheric projections of variable size situated in the subcutaneous layer over the pectoralis major muscle on either side of the chest.
A specialized form of connective tissue consisting primarily of adipocytes (fat cells), surrounded by a meshwork of collagen fibers.
Tissue or organ transplanted from a donor to a recipient.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 03/28/2018: CM Released as part of draft content review

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016
